Articles.Content:
Anybody know about the old Mercury days? This sketch inspired the line from Alan Shepard\'s Freedom 7 Launch, 'You\'re on your way, Jose!'

It\'s pretty funny>

(Is this getting close enough to not count as necro any more? =P )

More than that, it resulted in Bill Dana getting adopted as something of a mascot for the astronauts through the end of the Apollo program, and basically ending up being one of the most space-knowledgeable comedians out there, since they pretty much gave him full access as their guest. Why? Because in many ways, they felt that that routine 'told it like it is'...

Because in many ways, they felt that that routine 'told it like it is'...

LOL. That sounds shockingly horrible.
